title: Abyoso Hapsoro Nurhadi
text:
Hi, Aby here. You may also know me as Xyba or XybaFenix. „Çà„Çç„Åó„Åè~
I am a medior-level developer based in West Java, Indonesia (UTC+7). Experienced in building Machine Learning for research, products and various other applications.







My Availability



As of 5 January 2025:


‚ùå Not Available for Hire




‚ùå Not Available to Teach




üî¨ Available for Research Collaborations

Open to international collaboration in research for almost any industry (my preferences)





Feel free to drop a message!  My Mail ¬†¬†¬† My LinkedIn ¬†¬†¬† My Discord


You may request my services through the contacts above or at Upwork







Disclaimer



Website is currently optimized for desktop viewing and maximized window. There exists content which have display issues on mobile.

title: Featured Projects
text: This section highlights featured non-private projects. Most of these are taken from past-works. Some subsections are ‚ÄòU/C‚Äô meaning they are still under construction.

title: ML, AI and DS projects
text:
Twitter Analytics Dashboard
    Real-Time Indonesian Tweets Sentiment Analytics Dashboard with Social Network Analysis, Word Cloud and Sentiment Analysis features. Implemented an optimized Stochastic Gradient Descent Classifier achieving 77.02% classification accuracy.
    Tech Stack: Python, HTML, Flask, scikit-learn
     View Code
    üìÖ November 2021







    
    




    Schizophrenia Early Detection Prototype
    Pyschosis prediction on clinical high-risk teenager group using Latent Semantic Analysis and Part-of-Speech Tagging. Manually implemented a 3D Convex Hull Classifier based on medical paper achieving 95.36% mean classification accuracy.
    Tech Stack: Python, MATLAB, scikit-learn, scipy
    üìÖ April 2019   
    Note: Top image was edited from the linguistics of schizophrenia







    
    




    Quadcopter Flight Path Identification
    Project for IT Today IPB 2019 Data Science Competition, hosted in Kaggle. Implemented a Regression Chain achieving 0.00317 mean haversine distance.
    Tech Stack: Python, scikit-learn
     View Code
    üìÖ August 2019

title: Miscellaneous
text:
Random stuff

My favorite color is #2cb037!
Attributed with the INFJ personality type
I am a former debater! I used to specialize in Asian Parliamentary format with focus on English-based debates. This experience gives me a strong foundation of considering pros and cons of any topic making me highly-adaptable in terms of industry or Subject Matter Expertise

title: Miscellaneous
text:
Non-Code/Writing Creations









First personal logo created in 2017 to be the icon for my first Tkinter app, a number guessing game. Have been used as personal logo since though new personal logo is planned.







Document cover created using CorelDRAW in 2016 for Project Xyba, a question solution sharing project, during bachelor studies. Corner art made by Mishima Kurone.

title: Miscellaneous
text:
Full Name with Honorifics
R. Abyoso Hapsoro Nurhadi, S.Si., AWP

R.: Raden ‚Üí Hereditary Title indicating descendance of Javanese nobility (22 October 1998)
S.Si.: Sarjana Sains ‚Üí Indonesia equivalent of the Bachelor of Science title (27 July 2022)
AWP: Associate Wealth Planner ‚Üí Associate title awarded for junior financial planning expertise (15 January 2019)

title: About me
text:
26, Husband, Cat Parent and Visioner.
Lifelong Learner and Budding Researcher with focus in Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence. Graduated from University of Indonesia with a B.Sc. in Mathematics on 2022. Equipped with over 3 years of professional experience and 2.5 years of entry-level experience with Python as main tool of choice.
Aspiring to be a Machine Learning Generalist / General Machine Learning Specialist. Aiming to be a university lecturer by 2036.
Aby aspires to be a better person every day who leverages his accrued knowledge for all living beings. Aby aligns with the concept, ‚ÄúYou ultimately need to do what your heart feels is right‚Äù - Master of Masters, Kingdom Hearts.

Addendum
Versioning for this website (vX.Y.Z) is presented as follows:

  X = major release, affects entire website
  Y = minor release, affects features or elements
  Z = release number, affects content
